entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow in outlying areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
